text: The Mining Research and Development Establishment was a British government mining research centre in south Derbyshire. It is now a commercial business park. ==History== The Mining Research Establishment in west London was formed in 1951. It merged with the Central Engineering Establishment to form the MRDE in 1969.University of Nottingham ==Structure== The site was on the south side of the A511 in the south of Derbyshire. ==See also== * Coal Research Establishment ==References== Category:Coal mining in the United Kingdom Category:Engineering research institutes Category:Mining engineering Category:Mining organizations Category:Science and technology in Derbyshire Category:South Derbyshire District
title: Mining Research and Development Establishment
